title: Implement REPL auto-completion and multi-line input
body:
Add auto-completion and multi-line input support to the REPL.

**Deliverables:**
- Tab-completion for:
  - Identifiers in scope (functions, variables, types, constructors)
  - Module names (for `:load`)
  - REPL commands (`:quit`, `:type`, etc.)
- Multi-line input: detect incomplete expressions/declarations and prompt for continuation
- Integrate with linenoise or similar C library for readline-like behaviour
- History: up/down arrows to navigate command history, persist across sessions

**Design notes:**
- Auto-completion requires access to the current type environment
- GHCi's completion is quite good — use it as a reference for what to complete on
